message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40. This way we both walk away with something.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  Let's be a little more equitable this time.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Alice, it seems like we both want a good deal. This is my final offer, let's close this out.
